question: Khan working group that was appointed by the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) in December 1997 had which of the following functions:
option1: Reforms in the agricultural credit system
option2: Reforms in the industrial credit system
option3: Harmonize the role and operations of development finance institutions (DFIs) and banks.
option4: Examine the relevance of the concept of Maximum Permissible Bank Finance (MPBF)
answer: Harmonize the role and operations of development finance institutions (DFIs) and banks.
